meanings.sent1: She wondered whence the sound was coming.
meanings.sent2: He asked whence the river originated.
meanings.sent3: The detective followed the clues to whence the mysterious package had arrived.
meanings.sent4: The old map revealed whence the treasure was hidden.
meanings.sent5: The explorer finally discovered whence the rare gemstone had been unearthed.

meanings.sent1: He took the path whence the light was shining.
meanings.sent2: She followed the trail whence the footsteps led.
meanings.sent3: The cat pounced from whence the mouse had emerged.
meanings.sent4: The bridge led to a land whence no traveler returned.
meanings.sent5: The door opened to a room whence a mysterious glow emanated.

meanings.sent1: The event will start at noon; whence all are expected to arrive.
meanings.sent2: She remembered the day whence they first met.
meanings.sent3: The clock struck midnight, and whence the spell was broken.
meanings.sent4: The prophecy foretold a time whence the chosen one would appear.
meanings.sent5: The legend spoke of a moment whence the world would change forever.
